channel.title: swap on Linux | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in swap on Linux | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Add Swap File
item.description: sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=/mnt/file.swap bs=1M count=512 sudo mkswap /mnt/file.swap sudo chmod 0600 /mnt/file.swap sudo swapon /mnt/file.swap echo "/mnt/file.swap none swap sw 0 0" >> /etc/fstab See details in https://www.garron.me/en/linux/increase-swap-memory-linux.html
